relation: Beautiful! Nicer than it looked on the website! I chose ivory to match our kitchen decor even though it was an anniversary present. It's lovely- thanks! On 22-Jun-2015 the supplier responded: The heart trivet really is a pretty trivet and we are pleased to here that you think so too. Thank you for your ++ rating on our service and product. Happy Anniversary Cast In Style
A lovely, quality product - made a great gift for our 6th wedding anniversary.
Looks good. Just what I wanted.

I was expecting the product to be a little heavier but I'm still pleased and ideal for my present to my daughter and son-in-law for their 6th wedding anniversary.
